Exaggerate: The claim does not appear to exaggerate the incident. It accurately describes the video of locals in Indore chasing away health workers and pelting stones at them.
Lack enough support: The claim is supported by the video evidence and the confirmation from Alt News that the incident indeed took place in Indore.
Problematic assumption: There is no problematic assumption in the claim. It simply states the occurrence of the incident.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation provided in the claim. It focuses on the specific incident of locals chasing away health workers.
Contradict fact: The claim does not contradict any known facts.
Understate: The claim accurately represents the severity of the incident, without understating it.
Falters at times: There is no evidence to suggest that the claim falters at times. It presents the incident clearly and accurately.
